Title: Relates to controlled substance offenses qualifying for bail and allows courts to consider the risk of continued substance abuse
Summary: Qualifies controlled substance offenses for bail; allows police officers and courts to consider the risk of continued substance abuse and likelihood of serious harm to the principal when considering committing such principal to the custody of the sheriff.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to controlled substance offenses qualifying for bail and allowing courts to consider the risk of continued substance abuse
